properties.name: Mount Rushmore
properties.description: Posted by Pfourniersouth dAKOTAMount Rushmore took 14 years to build and was sculpted by Gutzon Borglum. The sculpting was a dedication to the former presidents. It was a long process to get the approval of the construction of the memorial but it finally began in 1927. The contruction of Mount Rushmore was said to eat up too much funds and the project was almost stopped. Mount Rushmore was 5,500 feet tall, and 800 million stones were used to build it! A president\'s head equaled the height of a 6 story building!

properties.name: Sphinx
properties.description: Posted by PfournierThe Sphinx is in Giza, Egypt and is the biggest sphinx. The closest pyramid to it is the Kuhfre\'s Pyramid. The Sphinx was built about 4 1/2 thousand years ago. The Sphinx has a body of a lion and a head of the man and most of it is made out of limestone. The size of the sphinx is about 240 ft long and 66 ft high. The Sphinx is also the oldest of its kind.

properties.name: Taipei Financial Center
properties.description: Posted by PfournierTaipei, TaiwanTaipei Financial Center, A.K.A. Taipei 101, is known as the tallest building in world today. It is located in east Taipei,Taiwan and stands at an amazing 1,671 ft! This building was designed by C.Y. Lee and Partners, and the Taiwanese architectual firm. The building is going to have the two fastest elevators in the world traveling at 37 miles per hour! The Taipei 101 has weather protection and can withstand a 7 rate earhquake on the scale. The building has 101 floors and inside there is even a mall, 6 storys high!

properties.name: Taj Mahal
properties.description: Posted by PfournierIndiaThe Taj Mahal means "Crown Palace". The Taj Mahal is located in Agra, India, also The Taj Mahal is one of the Seven Wonders of The World. It was named after the builders wife actually as a type of tomb for her after she passed away. The Taj Mahal was built by a ruler in India named Shah Jahan and it was built in 1831. It took 20,000 people to build it and it was almost torn down because England wanted to buy the marble it was made out of. This wonder took only 2 years to build.

properties.name: The Eiffel Tower
properties.description: Posted by PfournierParis, FranceThe Eiffel Tower was actually built as an entrance for a fair in Paris, France. The Tower took only two years to build and was completed in 1889. In 1999 the Eiffel Tower recieved 6,368,534 visitors! 300 iron workers were needed to build the Eiffel Tower(hard to find). 40 tons of paint, 2 1/2 million rivets, and 15,000 peices of iron were used in construction. The tower is 985 ft, 11 inches in height and weighs about 9,441 tons!

properties.name: The Grand Canyon
properties.description: Posted by PfournierArizonaThe Grand Canyon is also one of the Seven Wonders of the World, and is located in Northwest Arizona. The canyon is 277 miles long and is up to 18 miles wide! The Grand Canyon has over 5 million visiters a yea! The Grand Canyon reaches up to a miel deep. The canyon became a national park in 1930. The Grand Canyon\'s floor can reach up to 100 Degrees F.

properties.name: The Great Pyramid
properties.description: Posted by PfournieregyptThe Pyramid of Giza is one of the Seven Wonders of the World. The Great Pyramid was built around 2575 BC, and is about 480 ft tall! In its contruction 2,500,000 blocks were used that weighed about 2 1/2 tons and some blocks used for majo parts weighed over 50 tons! The Pyramid of Giza took 20 years to build and required 100,000 workers. However, it was still hard to build since the workers did not have pullys and other machines to lift heavy objects. They did however have copper chisels, copper saws, copper drills, and Adze with a copper blade which was used to smooth and shaape objects.

properties.name: The Great Wall of China
properties.description: Posted by PfournierChinaThe Great Wall of China was built to prevent invasion or takeover and to stop China\'s people from leaving. The Great Wall of China is over 75,000 miles long. The first establishment of the Great wall was in 7th century B.C. Many Updates have been made to the wall. Scientist have found 500 miles of the Great Wall that was buried fir hundreds of years. 70% of China worked on a 3,000 mile section when it was first being built. The Wall Height is about 25 ft.

properties.name: The Niagra Falls
properties.description: Posted by PfournierOntarioThree are a total of 3 water falls in Niagra Falls, American Falls, Bridal Veil Falls, and Horseshoe Falls. The falls reach up to 176 ft in height. The Horseshoe Falls alone distribute 600,000 gallons of water a second! Before video cameras and film was made people would sketch the falls. A 63 year old teacher wwas the first to survive going over the falls in a barrel. A lot of the worlds freshwater goes over the Niagra falls

properties.name: Yellowstone National Park
properties.description: Posted by PfournierÂ Yellow Stone has about 2,221,776. You\'ll find it by the northwestern part of wyoming near the border. The park is covered most by forest along with some volcanic land. The tallest peak in wyoming is Eagle Peak which is about 11,358 feet in elevation. Yellowstone has hotsprings, geysers, mudpots, and fumaroles which make up a lot of each of them being very hot caused by magma underneath. An interesting fact about yellowstone is that it is recongnize to be the worlds oldest national park.
